thread.title: 16 Sick Burns From "The Devil Wears Prada" That Still Hurt To This Day
thread.title_full: 16 Sick Burns From "The Devil Wears Prada" That Still Hurt To This Day

author: Sam Stryker
title: 16 Sick Burns From "The Devil Wears Prada" That Still Hurt To This Day
text:
View this image ›
Fox / Via idamnxx.tumblr.com ID: 10339946 2. When Emily roasted Andy for her sartorial choices: View this image ›
Fox / Via amberbrass.tumblr.com ID: 10339912 3. When Miranda just wanted her damn caffeine: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10339919 4. When Miranda used sarcasm to the fullest effect: View this image ›
Fox / Via amberbrass.tumblr.com ID: 10339926 5. When Nigel smelled something funny: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10339928 6. Not an individual burn, but EVERYTHING about the “Miranda dropping her coat and bag on Andy’s desk” montage: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=UD-IVdxdjyQ . youtube.com / Via FOX ID: 10340087 7. When Emily fought sickness in the most fashion-forward way possible: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10340028 8. When Miranda was just being Miranda: View this image ›
Fox / Via thefrankiemateo.tumblr.com ID: 10339940 9. And when she just wanted to get the hell out of Miami, hurricanes be damned: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10340015 10. When Emily gave a proper burn: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10340095 11. When Miranda was having NONE. OF. IT. from Andy: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10339969 12. When Miranda didn’t even need to look Emily in the eye to deliver this burn: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10339994 13. When Andy finally delivered a burn of her own: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10339995 14. When Emily was BEFUDDLED at Andy’s choices: View this image ›
Fox ID: 10340022 15. When Miranda needed everyone just to move faster: View this image ›
Fox / Via optimisticoveranalyzer.tumblr.com ID: 10340049 16. And finally (OF COURSE WE DIDN’T FORGET IT) the time Miranda made sure we ALL knew what “cerulean” is: https://goodtimesfor.tumblr.com/post/87523487789/sad-but-true View this embed ›
